General_Description: '''Always Vengeance''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: [[Sparta]]n soldiers occupying [[Athens|Athenian]] lands were always targets of vengeance. Even a midwife, it turns out, would hire [[Mercenary|mercenaries]] to kill soldiers.
Section_References:
